title: GD sucks.
body:
I'm gone lol.

Won't be back. 

On a more serious note I've already removed anyone involved with GD on my friends list.

Work has taken up too much of my time to be apart of this children's circus show any longer, sorry but I've got better things to do rather than worry about an internet forum and playing this shitty game. Plus I'm already an owner of a business as well so I need to put that above anything too. <3

Farewell~
